search.query: source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" maxevents=2 | dedup clientip | eval successIndex=mvfind(file, "success.do") | eval timePurchase=mvindex(req_time, successIndex) | eval price=mvindex(other, successIndex) | eval clientip=mvindex(clientip, successIndex) | eval prodId = mvfilter(productId!="NULL") | table clientip timePurchase price prodId

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie | stats dc(productId) as numProducts | eval countUnpurchesed=numProducts-[search source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" maxevents=2 | eval prodId=mvfilter(productId!="NULL") | stats dc(prodId) as numPurchesed | return $numPurchesed] | table countUnpurchesed
source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie | stats count by referer_domain | sort - by count
source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase uri_path="/cart.do" OR "/cart/success.do" status=200 | stats count

table.title: Most popular products in the best seller category

search.query: source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" maxevents=2 | search [search source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" | eval catId=mvfilter(categoryId!="NULL") | top 1 catId | table catId | rename catId as categoryId] | eval prodId=mvfilter(productId!="NULL") | rename prodId as productId | top 5 productId | lookup prices.csv productId

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie | transaction JSESSIONID mvlist=true | eval indexSuccess=mvfind(file, "success.do") | search indexSuccess="*" | eval timeSuccess=strptime(mvindex(req_time,indexSuccess), "%d/%b/%Y:%H:%M:%S") | eval timeLogin=strptime(mvindex(req_time,0), "%d/%b/%Y:%H:%M:%S") | eval timeToPurchase=timeSuccess-timeLogin | stats min(timeToPurchase) as minPurchaseTime

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase uri_path="/cart/success.do" status=200 | streamstats window=2 min(_time) as prevTime max(_time) as purchaseTime | eval maxSecsDiffBetweenPurchases=purchaseTime-prevTime | stats max(maxSecsDiffBetweenPurchases)

table.title: top 5 prodects in the best seller category - DONTLOOK

search.query: source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | stats count

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase uri_path="/cart/success.do" status=200 | eval date=substr(req_time,0,11) | stats sum(other) as income count max(_time) as timeToSort by date | sort timeToSort | fields - timeToSort | streamstats window=2 first(income) as prevIncome last(income) as lastIncome | eval growthPerc=(lastIncome-prevIncome)/prevIncome*100 | reverse
source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | stats count

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" maxevents=2 | eval prodId=mvfilter(productId!="NULL") | table prodId | streamstats window=2 max(prodId) as prod1 min(prodId) as prod2 | eval followingSales = prod1+ "---->" + prod2 | stats count by followingSales | sort - count

table.title: number of different purchases and different products by user

search.query: source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action="purchase" [search source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie status=200 | dedup clientip | table clientip] | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" maxevents=2 | eval prodId=mvfilter(productId!="NULL") | stats count as countOfPurchases dc(prodId) by clientip

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie | top 1 clientip by date_wday | eval dayIndex=case(date_wday=="sunday",1,date_wday=="monday",2,date_wday=="tuesday",3,date_wday=="wednesday",4,date_wday=="thursday",5,date_wday=="friday",6,date_wday=="saturday",7) | sort dayIndex | fields - dayIndex

source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie | stats dc(productId) as numProducts | eval countUnpurchesed=numProducts-[search source="tutorialdata.zip:*" sourcetype=access_combined_wcookie action=purchase status=200 | transaction JSESSIONID,itemId mvlist=true maxspan=10s endswith="success.do" maxevents=2 | eval prodId=mvfilter(productId!="NULL") | stats dc(prodId) as numPurchesed | return $numPurchesed] | table countUnpurchesed
